sections.immutable: Fields that never change after creation
sections.system: Fields updated automatically by the system
sections.llm_only: Fields only AI should modify during enrichment

_comments: IMMUTABLE FIELDS - Set once at creation, never change

source.method: paste | upload | url | drop | manual | api
source.timestamp: ISO timestamp when content was ingested

content.type: text | code | image | video | audio | document | etc
content.full_text: The complete original content (for text-based files)
content.hash: SHA256 hash of the content for deduplication
content.file_type: js | md | pdf | etc - file extension

_comments2: SYSTEM FIELDS - Managed by the system
title: Display title (initially from filename)

location.final_path: Path after organization (null if still in inbox)

_comments3: USER-EDITABLE FIELDS - Users can modify these
_comments4: LLM-ONLY FIELDS - Only AI modifies these

llm_analysis.category: education | technical | reference | business | creative | personal | general
llm_analysis.title: AI-suggested better title for the content
llm_analysis.summary: 2-3 sentence AI-generated summary of the content
llm_analysis.reasoning: Why the AI chose this categorization
